Posts.Content: Trimix worked for me. I had my surgery 4/05 and I'm now starting to back down my dose to get the same effect. I have found that you don't want to over do it, as tempting as it may sound to have solid wood. Better to find that dose that makes you firm but not "solid" and allows stimulation to do the rest.
Posts.Title: post prostate surgery : no eraction
